column4: IN BRIEF: Ventas nabs Assurant's top lawyer as general counsel
column5: Ventas Inc, a U.S. healthcare real-estate investment trust, has swiped Assurant Inc’s legal chief Carey Roberts to serve as its general counsel.
column6: Roberts will join Chicago-based Ventas sometime in the first quarter of 2020, the company said in a statement on Tuesday. She will report to Ventas’ chief executive officer Debra Cafaro, the statement said.
column7: To read the full story on Westlaw Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2T2zYPT
